voice.name: VOICE_ACTOR
voice.description: Female, 30s, American. Clear mezzo-soprano with warm conversational tone and slight Pacific Northwest accent. Natural and expressive, suitable for audiobook narration and character work.

reference_audio.transcript: The rain fell softly on the cedar trees outside my window.
reference_audio.context: Original voice recording used as clone source. Studio quality.

reference_audio.transcript: I remember the summer we spent at the lake house, watching fireflies at dusk.
reference_audio.context: Original voice recording used as clone source. Studio quality.

provenance.notes: Voice cloned from the creator's own recordings with full consent. Source recordings are bundled in the archive for traceability.
